black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (character) Princess Kensli standing outside a large wooden door labeled "PRINT SHOP", looking hesitant and peeking around the doorframe, wearing a crown and a simple adventure dress.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The King looking worried and talking to (character) Princess Kensli, who looks determined and is holding up a sparkling, rainbow-colored ruler.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The inside of the print shop. Big, complicated machines with gears and rollers loom over tiny (character) Princess Kensli. Steam comes out of one machine. Kensli looks small but is walking forward.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A round, messy monster made entirely of dripping ink blobs with a goofy grin. It has splashes on the floor around it. (character) Princess Kensli is pointing her ruler at it.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A skinny, jagged goblin made of crumpled paper and tape, holding a stack of shiny books (the Proofs) in its crinkly claws. (character) Princess Kensli looks angry and brave.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (character) Princess Kensli using her ruler to straighten a piece of paper. The Ink-Blob and Paper-Jam monsters look sad and defeated, shrinking away into a dark corner.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (character) Princess Kensli hugging a large stack of glowing, perfect books. She has a big smile on her face. The machines in the background look quiet now.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A triumphant scene. (character) Princess Kensli holding the books high in the air. The King is clapping, and cute castle animals are cheering around her. The sun is shining brightly.
